title: Primordial Monarch Core (Part 2)
body:
Primordial Monarch Core (Part 2)

Even after Evan passed out, the Rune of Origin continued to transform the energy of the formation, and in about ten hours, his Monarch core turned completely into liquid.

Once Evan's Monarch Core turned into complete liquid, the Rune Of Origin stopped transforming the energy of the formation.

The moment the Rune Of Origin stopped transforming the energy, the normal energy of the formation rushed towards his prime core.

Woosh!

Evan's Prime Core was just a step away from evolving to the next stage, so the moment the energy of the formation came into contact with it, his Prime Core started to absorb the energy like a black hole.

In just one minute, Evan's Prime Core reached the boundary of the Rank One and was about to evolve.

But just as it was about to evolve to the next stage, the Rune Of Origin that was engraved on Evan's chest once again shone.

Crack...

Just as the Rune Of Origin shone, a crack appeared on Evan's Prime Core.
